Stem Length: 12"
Waterproof: Yes

[Information]

Also known as Belladonna Lily, lovely Amaryllis blooms symbolize the true meaning of unsurpassed beauty. Our silk replicas of fresh Amaryllis flowers are crafted with finest artistry to mimic the sheer elegance and cheerful radiance of real flowers. Unlike fresh flowers that not only cost a fortune, but also wither very soon, these fabric imitations will continue blooming forever, oozing perpetual radiance and conveying the true meaning of “ endless” splendid beauty. Use these attractive faux flowers to decorate your home space, party venue, tabletops, vases, centerpieces, backdrops, and bouquets.

Additional Information:

  • Material: High Quality Silk Flowers
  • 1 Qty: 6 Bushes (Total 144 Flowers)
  • Each Bush: 24 Flowers
  • Flower Length with Stem: 14"
  • Flower Length: 2" 
  • Flower Width: 3"
  • Stem Length: 12"
  • Waterproof: Yes
  • Uses: Table Decoration, Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Centerpieces, Vases, Stage Decoration

    Soft, smooth, and silky polyester roses are intricately handcrafted with amazing details and finest artistry to facilitate you lavishly in making the wonderful accents to any event,  DIY or home crafting projects. These lovely faux roses are crafted with high quality polyester and are rolled in an enchanting manner. The life-like appearance and vibrant shades of these flowers will add an eye-catching refreshing impact to your tabletops, backdrops, bouquets, vases, centerpieces and floral arrangements. Our high quality polyester buds are reusable, durable, and affordable. Unlike the fresh roses, that not only cost the fortune, but also wither in short time, these polyester roses will stay blooming and thriving forever. For extra glitz and glam, add some of our lustrous pearl sprays, ornate picks, glittered stem and ribbons to achieve that super chic look for prom corsages or wedding accessories and bouquets. If you are seeking something delicate but enchanting for your DIY project, these artificial polyester roses are just the solution.

entry.title: 2 Pack | 31" Metallic Champagne Artificial Palm Leaf Display Filler Floral Decoration
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5120

Fronds Count: 36 Fronds / Bush

No bendable wire inside the Fronds.

Fronds are spray painted with metallic paint.
Great for indoor use. Dry dust for easy care and cleaning.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Bursting with sparkle and style, these glamorous floral picks are made to WOW the beholders! Their charismatic combination of nature and craft inspiration makes them an ethereal addition to your tabletops, centerpieces, Christmas tree decorations, and floral arrangements. Enriching your surrounding with surreal shimmer and providing your décor with a touch of glittery elegance, our metallic tone frond picks are great to use in weddings, parties, holiday functions, and home accenting. From your coffee table to your mantle, place these anywhere in your home for exuding monochromatic beauty. Perfect to use on their own, these stems create a whimsical look when combined with other picks, arrangements, floral stems, and bouquets. Bend the wiry branches to create that stunner look! Bring a bit of fancy and pizazz by placing these in our tall vases or let them lie flat oozing mystic beauty to your tables, cabinets, shelves, and aisle. Available in a range of classy shades, get the one that matches your theme to add that perfect finishing touch to your decorative flower arrangement, swag or welcoming wreath.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Soft Plastic
  • Qty: 2 Bushes / Order
  • Overall Height: 31" 
  • Overall Width: 8"
  • Stem Height: 18" 
  • Stem Color: Brown
  • Bendable Wire Stem: Yes
  • Fronds Count: 36 Fronds / Bush
  • Frond (leaves) Height: 14" 
  • Individual Frond size: 2.5" smallest | 5.5" largest
  • Frond Thickness: Less than 1/2"
  • No bendable wire inside the Fronds.
  • Fronds are flexible but not sturdy enough to stay bent.
  • Fronds are spray painted with metallic paint.
  • Great for indoor use. Dry dust for easy care and cleaning.

Note: Petals are spray painted with metallic paint. May have some blemishes. Can get wet but don't recommend.

entry.summary:

[About]

Quantity: 2 Glass Vases (Different Size)
Material: Glass
Color: Matte White
Style: Matte Finish Geometric Glass Vases
Small Vase Size: 5.5"H x 6.25"W
Large Vase Size: 7.75"H x 5.75"W
Glass Thickness: 5mm
Small Vase Top Opening: 3"
Small Vase Base: 3.5"
Small Vase Depth: 4.75"
Large Vase Top Opening: 4.25"
Large Vase Base: 4.25"
Large Vase Depth: 7.5" 
Base of both vases are clear / see-through
Small Vase has Top and Base shaped as a Pentagon
Large Vase has Top and Base shaped as a Hexagon
Perfect for floral and candle displays
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Small size ideal for placement on shelf, windowsill, desk, and tabletop surfaces
  • Unique geometric design complements modern decors
  • Item is for Vases Only. Flowers and other decorative accessories not included.
  • Great for everyday decor or for use as decorative centerpieces for weddings and special events
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

  • Boxwood Leaves are also on top part of the pot
  • NO MAINTENANCE NEEDED: Maintenance is minimal as there is no need to water or trim. The perfect choice for people who don't have a green thumb. You can enjoy a beautifully decorated space with minimal effort.
  • PERFECT GIFT: A wonderful addition to your office and home decor. This statue decoration is also fun for gift giving for your family and friends as a Father's Day, birthdays, housewarming, weddings and Christmas gift.

Type: Peony
1 Qty: 6 Flowers

Colors: 2 Colors (Periwinkle & Turquoise)
Note: Video Tutorial Included on web page . For access, click on the YouTube icon.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

With their delicate beauty and cheerful colors, flowers have always been the top rank decoration for designers, decorators, and event planners. And with our intricately handcrafted Paper Peony Giant Flowers, you can now give an everlasting radiant color to your Party Tables, Centerpieces, Garden Décor, Backdrops, Photo Booths, etc. Imitating the strikingly natural construction of real Peonies, these giant 3D paper peony blossoms feature gorgeous layers of fluffed petals and fully detailed pistil center. With the sturdy backing, these giant flowers have the ability to hang on walls or curtains, or for a long lasting setup, use with our Glue Dots to stick strongly on backgrounds, walls, tables, arches, aisle, trees, ceiling, and any other space that deserves a boost of colorful magic. 

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tissue Paper
  • Type: Peony
  • 1 Qty: 6 Flowers 
  • Sizes: 12", 16" & 20" (2 pcs each)
  • Colors: 2 Colors (Periwinkle & Turquoise)
  • Note: Video Tutorial Included on web page . For access, click on the YouTube icon.
